pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rosa-python-clientPypi: [rosa-python-client](https://pypi.org/project/rosa-python-client/) A utility to run ROSA commands in CLI## Release new version### requirements:* Export GitHub token```bashexport GITHUB_TOKEN=<your_github_token>```* [release-it](https://github.com/release-it/release-it)```bashsudo npm install --global release-itnpm install --save-dev @release-it/bumper```### usage:* To create a new release, run:```bashgit maingit pullrelease-it # Follow the instructions```
